text: Zaraz (shcho bahato novykh lyudey pryyednalysya do vas) BOH vstyh lehshe dlya vas, dlya Vin znaye shcho vy ye ne taki sylʹni yak vy zvychayno buly. Z tsʹoho chasu, sto steadfast viruyuchi mozhutʹ zavdaty porazky dvom sto, ta tysyacha vy mozhete zavdaty porazky dvom tysyachi BOZHYM vid'yizdom. BOH ye z tsymy khto steadfastly persevere
